response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only stands as a testament to our dedication to excellence but also comes with a host of features that promise to enhance your daily experience. Given its craftsmanship and the benefits it offers, we believe its true value exceeds $150. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $180. This is an opportunity to own a piece that combines functionality, durability, and style at a price that reflects its superior quality. I trust you will appreciate its value and make the most of this offer.", "product_price": 180}
